cause.description:
Whether it's because it's the only option in a small town, because it puts us right in the city center, because it's the most energy efficient form of intercity transportation, or because it's just more fun, trains are a travel choie that Americans want and need.
1. Trains are a travel choice Americans want.
cause.mission: support Amtrak and passenger rail in the United States
cause.name: Take the Train!
